name: Ike
description:
Ike is having a nightmare when due to a thunder he suddenly wakes up terrified, so Ike wants to reach the parents' room.

Ike is a university project created within the course of the Virtual Reality of the Polytechnic University of Turin.

DEVELOPERS

  • Martin Gabriele
  • Scrimieri Antonio
  • Vigna Nicolò
  • Vilardo Giulia
  • Zabardi Giovanni

CONTROLS

  • moved with WASD+mouse
  • interaction with E
  • crouch with SPACEBAR
  • pause with P
